attributes.action: To help the homeless even more and stop them from dying so young
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many people are dying because of living on the streets in 24 hours the goverment raised billions of pounds to help the banks what about the homeless people of this great nation should we continue to look the other way i think not being homeless myself living on the street and scottish I think homeless people are scared and need help more than what the church offers it need goverment care not police checks people have a right to live and the goverment need to help on this matter for the sake of everyone

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
